players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we all stay safe."
Diana: "I agree with Bob. Let's keep a close eye on each other to ensure everyone's safety."

Bob: "I think it's important that we all share any suspicious occurrences or observations we may have had last night. This will help us ensure everyone's safety and potentially uncover the truth behind Charlie's death."

Diana: "I'd like to remind everyone that we all need to work together to ensure everyone's safety in this game. Let's continue sharing any suspicious occurrences or observations we may have had last night."
